definition: someone who creates plans to be used in making something (such as buildings)
details:
noun
- someone who creates plans to be used in making something (such as buildings)
= synonyms: architect
- someone who designs clothing
= synonyms: couturier, fashion designer, clothes designer
- a person who devises plots or intrigues
= example: a person who devises plots or intrigues
= synonyms: intriguer
- someone who specializes in graphic design
= synonyms: graphic designer
- a person who specializes in designing architectural interiors and their furnishings
= synonyms: interior designer
